name: EntitiesTest
description: Unit tests for the Entities class, focusing on escape and unescape functionalities.

test_cases.name: escape
test_cases.description: Tests the escape functionality of the Entities class with different escape modes and character sets.

test_cases.name: escapeDefaults
test_cases.description: Tests the default escape functionality of the Entities class.

test_cases.name: escapedSupplementary
test_cases.description: Tests the escape functionality of the Entities class with supplementary characters.

test_cases.name: unescapeMultiChars
test_cases.description: Tests the unescape functionality of the Entities class with multi-character entities.

test_cases.name: xhtml
test_cases.description: Tests the codepoint and name mapping functionalities of the xhtml escape mode.

test_cases.name: getByName
test_cases.description: Tests the getByName functionality of the Entities class.

test_cases.name: escapeSupplementaryCharacter
test_cases.description: Tests the escape functionality of the Entities class with supplementary characters.

test_cases.name: notMissingMultis
test_cases.description: Tests the unescape functionality of the Entities class with multi-character entities.

test_cases.name: notMissingSupplementals
test_cases.description: Tests the unescape functionality of the Entities class with supplementary characters.

test_cases.name: unescape
test_cases.description: Tests the unescape functionality of the Entities class with various entities.

test_cases.name: strictUnescape
test_cases.description: Tests the strict unescape functionality of the Entities class for attributes.

test_cases.name: caseSensitive
test_cases.description: Tests the case sensitivity of the escape and unescape functionalities of the Entities class.

test_cases.name: quoteReplacements
test_cases.description: Tests the unescape functionality of the Entities class with quote replacements.

test_cases.name: letterDigitEntities
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing and output settings of letter and digit entities in HTML.

test_cases.name: noSpuriousDecodes
test_cases.description: Tests that no spurious decoding occurs in the Entities class.

test_cases.name: escapesGtInXmlAttributesButNotInHtml
test_cases.description: Tests the escaping of '>' in XML attributes but not in HTML.

test_cases.name: controlCharactersAreEscaped
test_cases.description: Tests that control characters are escaped in both HTML and XML.

test_cases.name: escapeByClonedOutputSettings
test_cases.description: Tests the escape functionality of the Entities class using cloned output settings.

test_cases.name: parseHtmlEncodedEmojiMultipoint
test_cases.description: Tests the unescape functionality of the Parser class with multi-point HTML encoded emoji.

test_cases.name: parseHtmlEncodedEmoji
test_cases.description: Tests the unescape functionality of the Parser class with HTML encoded emoji.
